front.title: An implementation approach to Source Address Validation

abstract.t: This note is intended to flesh out a comment made on a mailing list.It describes one of many possible implementation approaches to SAVIsystems, and is intended as much as anything to be an existence proofthat there is at least one that would work.RequirementsThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
